verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, 'I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

'You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4639>what<s%> is <S%H4639>done<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you <S%H3427>lived,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> are you to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4639>what<s%> is <S%H4639>done<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I am <S%H935>bringing<s%> you; you shall not <S%H1980>walk<s%> in their <S%H2708>statutes.<s%>
'You are to <S%H6213>perform<s%> My <S%H4941>judgments<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> to <S%H1980>live<s%> in accord with them; I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

'So you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and My <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> may <S%H2421>live<s%> if he <S%H6213>does<s%> them; I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H376>'None<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of you shall <S%H7126>approach<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H7607>blood<s%> <S%H7607>relative<s%> of his to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your father, that is, the <S%H1>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H6172>mother.<s%> She is your <S%H517>mother;<s%> you are not to <S%H517>uncover<s%> her <S%H1540>nakedness.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your father's <S%H802>wife;<s%> it is your father's <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

'The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H269>sister,<s%> [either] your father's <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> your mother's <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> whether <S%H4138>born<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4138>born<s%> <S%H2351>outside,<s%> their <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> you shall not <S%H1540>uncover.<s%>

'The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your son's <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> your <S%H1323>daughter<s%>'s daughter, their <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> you shall not <S%H1540>uncover;<s%> for their <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> is yours.

'The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your father's wife's <S%H1>daughter,<s%> <S%H1323>born<s%> to your father, she is your <S%H4138>sister,<s%> you shall not <S%H269>uncover<s%> her <S%H1540>nakedness.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your father's <S%H269>sister;<s%> she is your father's <S%H7607>blood<s%> <S%H7607>relative.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your mother's <S%H269>sister,<s%> for she is your mother's <S%H7607>blood<s%> <S%H7607>relative.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your father's <S%H251>brother;<s%> you shall not <S%H7126>approach<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> she is your <S%H1733>aunt.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your daughter-in-law; she is your son's <S%H802>wife,<s%> you shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your brother's <S%H802>wife;<s%> it is your brother's <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

'You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> and of her <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you <S%H3947>take<s%> her son's <S%H1323>daughter<s%> or her <S%H1323>daughter<s%>'s daughter, to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> they are <S%H7607>blood<s%> <S%H7607>relatives.<s%> It is <S%H2154>lewdness.<s%>

'And you shall not <S%H3947>marry<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H413>addition<s%> to her <S%H269>sister<s%> as a <S%H9505>rival<s%> while she is <S%H9132>alive,<s%> to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
'Also you shall not <S%H7126>approach<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> during her <S%H5079>menstrual<s%> <S%H2932>impurity.<s%>
'And you shall not <S%H5414>have<s%> <S%H2233>intercourse<s%> <S%H7903><s%> with your neighbor's <S%H802>wife,<s%> to be <S%H2930>defiled<s%> with her.

<S%H3808>'Neither<s%> shall you <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of your <S%H2233>offspring<s%> to <S%H5674>offer<s%> them to <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you <S%H2455>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of your <S%H430>God;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H7901>lie<s%> with a <S%H2145>male<s%> as one <S%H7901>lies<s%> with a <S%H802>female;<s%> it is an <S%H8441>abomination.<s%>

'Also you shall not <S%H5414>have<s%> <S%H7903>intercourse<s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> to be <S%H2930>defiled<s%> with it, <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall <S%H802>any<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> an <S%H929>animal<s%> to <S%H7250>mate<s%> with it; it is a <S%H8397>perversion.<s%>

'Do not <S%H2930>defile<s%> yourselves by <S%H3605>any<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things;<s%> for by <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H7971>casting<s%> out <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you have <S%H2930>become<s%> <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>

'For the <S%H776>land<s%> has <S%H2930>become<s%> <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> therefore I have <S%H6485>visited<s%> its <S%H5771>punishment<s%> upon it, so the <S%H776>land<s%> has <S%H9513>spewed<s%> out its <S%H3427>inhabitants.<s%>

'But as for you, you are to <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and My <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> [neither] the <S%H249>native,<s%> nor the <S%H1616>alien<s%> who <S%H1481>sojourns<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you

(for the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have been <S%H6440>before<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> has <S%H2930>become<s%> <S%H2930>defiled<s%>);

so that the <S%H776>land<s%> may not <S%H9513>spew<s%> you out, should you <S%H2930>defile<s%> it, as it has <S%H9513>spewed<s%> out the <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has been <S%H6440>before<s%> you.

'For <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> those <S%H5315>persons<s%> who <S%H6213>do<s%> [so] shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H9415>people.<s%>

'Thus you are to <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H4931>charge,<s%> that you do not <S%H6213>practice<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of the <S%H8441>abominable<s%> <S%H2708>customs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have been <S%H6213>practiced<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, so as not to <S%H2930>defile<s%> yourselves with them; I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>' "
